mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mm_m_sub (id, pub_set_hash, subscriber_id, group, name, tree, operator_id, begin_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{pub_set_hash}, #{subscriberId}, #{group}, #{name}, #{tree}, #{operatorId}, #{beginTime})
mapper.select: SELECT msub.id, msub.pub_set_hash, msub.subscriber_id, msub.group, msub.name, msub.tree, msub.operator_id FROM mm_m_sub msub, mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_ext mext WHERE msub.pub_set_hash = mpub.pub_set_hash AND mpub.ext_id = mext.id AND mext.name = 'root' AND msub.subscriber_id = #{subscriberId} AND msub.group = #{group} AND msub.name = #{name} AND msub.tree = #{tree}
